properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
TWO PERSONS FROM VESSEL BREAKTHROUGH ATLANTIC
ABANDONING SHIP IN 23-41N 024-05W. VESSELS IN
VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO MRCC FALMOUTH,
PHONE: 4413 2631 7575,
FAX: 4413 2631 5610,
E-MAIL: FALMOUTHCOASTGUARD@MCGA.GOV.UK.
